name: congo
content:
the Congo (also the Congo River)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a major river in central Africa, and one of the longest rivers in the world: They managed to get on board a powerboat willing to make the seven-day journey down the Congo. They inhabit most of the continent south of the Congo River except the extreme southwest.
More examplesFewer examplesI built my hut near the Congo and it lulled me to sleep.The city is beautifully set between the Congo River to the south and the Tshopo river to the north.The incident occurred near Kinshasa's Congo River port, directly across from Brazzaville.
